snippet.title: No Heroes Allowed: No Puzzles Either! Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
No Heroes Allowed: No Puzzles Either!™ is a Free digital download exclusively for PlayStation®Vita system. The "Yu-nama" series is originally known as dungeon strategy game with its unique 8-bit pixel art style and parody-contained dialogue.
As a "God of Destruction," you must use your evil power of destruction to defeat more than 200 quirky looking heroes in 64 levels of match-three puzzles. As you conquer levels and capture heroes, the heroes are banished to your dungeon, where they work for you to dig up valuable items in the mines that can be used as power ups during subsequent levels.

http://us.playstation.com/psvita/games-and-media/psv-no-heroes-allowed-no-puzzles-either.html

"PlayStation" and the "PS" Family logo are registered trademarks of Sony Computer Entertainment Inc.
©2014 Sony Computer Entertainment Inc. No Heroes Allowed and No Heroes Allowed: No Puzzles Either! are trademarks of Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC.
